title: Interpretation of a black dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Wearing black in a dream Clothes are one of the things that can cause anxiety when seen in some dreams for many people who do not know the correct interpretation of seeing it and do not know what it can signify, especially colors that are not considered happy like wearing clothes. Black in a dream, and this is its correct interpretation in all cases. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black in a dream: Seeing wearing black in a dream often indicates the possession of power, influence, and high status that the person in the dream may enjoy in the society in which he lives. It is one of the signs that may indicate the divine change that he is going through in his life, and the great change In all his material and moral circumstances in the life he lives among people. The presence of this dress in a dream may mean that there are some disputes that arise between the fortuneteller and a close friend of his who keeps and preserves his secrets, but this dispute will not last long and will be settled between them. Seeing it in a dream may indicate The person is exposed to a state of depression or the desire to remain alone and not mix with many people in the society in which he lives, and to self-love and introversion. The appearance of this color in many dreams may indicate that the dreamer will go through some moments in which his life will change, i.e. a stage that has not He goes through it before and will improve all the conditions in which he lives. . The best is by the command of the Lord of the Worlds. Interpretation of black clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin presented many cases in which one can see wearing black in a dream and explained the interpretation of each of them as follows. The presence of this color in a dream indicates that the person is going through a difficult period in his life and that he is carrying His heart is full of worries and intense sadness as a result of his being exposed to some problems in his practical life that he lives among people. The presence of this color in the robes in a dream in the event that the dreamer is afflicted with some kind of disease indicates that the fatigue he suffers from in the body has not been found for the appropriate treatment. And you won't be. Able to get rid of it or recover now or soon. The appearance of this color in any type of fur that a person may wear in a dream means that the spiteful person carries a lot of hatred and envy for the blessings that he has in his life and that is why you must stay away from it and be severe. Caution in dealing with others. The black color in clothing symbolizes that if it was worn at the time of crying by someone who had already died, then this vision does not bode well, as it means that this dead person did not have many good deeds that could benefit him in his afterlife. And a lot of prayer is required. A person’s love for this color in a dream and his efforts in wearing it show a lot of good that he can obtain, as it foretells that he will be able to achieve all the dreams that he sought throughout the days of his previous life. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black in a dream for Nablus: If you see a dead person wearing this color, then

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about separating from someone I know, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about divorce from someone I knowInterpretation of divorce from someone I know in a dream spells out the conclusion that the dreamer will see a big change in his life, whether good or bad. This is due to the rest of the details that appear in the dream, and in the following paragraphs we have presented a number of the most accurate interpretations that were given regarding seeing the divorce of someone I know in a dream... So follow the interpretation of the dream of divorce from someone I know. Seeing divorce in a dream generally means that the dreamer will get rid of the fears in his life by order From God soon. In case the dreamer witnesses the divorce of someone he knows, this person will soon find great comfort and peace in his life, which will make him happier than before. It is also a sign of achieving goals and fulfilling desires sooner than now. When the dreamer sees in a dream a divorce Someone he knows, this is a sign of a big change in his life, especially at the work level, and there are many good things that will happen to the dreamer in his life. Seeing someone’s divorce in a dream means that the dreamer will soon achieve the dreams he desires and will be free from the pressure placed on him. Interpretation Dream of divorcing someone I know by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the divorce of someone I know in a dream indicates the presence of a third person to the fortuneteller’s circumstances, whether at work or in the family. In the event that the dreamer sees the divorce of a familiar person in the dream, this means that the period of sadness that was Suspended in his life for a period of time will end and his problems will be less by God’s command. The Imam also explained that this dream is a good indication of the adjustment that is happening to him and that will save him from the worries that he was regretting. Interpretation of dreams of divorce with someone I know for single people. Seeing the divorce of someone I know in one dream means That the dreamer will be one of the survivors and that God will save her from what is occupying her mind. In addition, seeing Hazal in the dream symbolizes the success and superiority that the dreamer will see in the coming days. The separation of the person who knows the girl in the dream carries many good interpretations, one of which is that she misses this person And the person who prevented him from being in her life. On the other hand, commentators explained that the divorce of one of her acquaintances in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will be separated from the person she loves, which will cause her great sadness, and God knows best. But if she dreams that someone she knows is making the decision to divorce, then this A sign that she has approached an important and serious issue and that she should be more prepared for what is happening in her life. The divorce of relatives in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that there are major disagreements in her family and she cannot do anything. Seeing marriage and divorce in a girl’s dream means that she will suffer to an extent She will be tired in the coming period and she must prepare well for that. Divorce from an unknown person or stranger in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of good news soon. Divorce with someone I know. Interpretation of dreams for a married woman. Seeing the divorce of someone I know in a married dream indicates that the dreamer He has a lot of worries and loneliness, as he does not find anyone to comfort him. There is also a vision in this dream that it is an indication of different things.

title: The 14 most important interpretations of seeing a volcano in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an active volcano? It means great risks that you will be exposed to in your life. What does seeing a volcano mean? It means success in work. What is the interpretation of a volcano and smoke for a single woman? This means that he feels frozen desires. What does seeing volcanic eruptions mean? This means that she is an active woman who does many successful works. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself running away from a volcano in a dream? A sign that you are afraid. Interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a mountain volcano and it was inactive, this means past fears that he remembers and thinks about for a long time. Interpretation of seeing an active volcano means strong risks that you will face in your life. A volcano means anger from some people. If the volcano erupts and is in the sea, this means that he will reap great benefit, and perhaps the dreamer will marry if he is a virgin. Most often, all sea volcanoes are a good vision for the dreamer by the command of God Almighty. Seeing a dream about a volcano for singles If he sees a volcano and smoke for a single person, this means that he feels frozen desires that he cannot express. It may mean that she has gone through very bad experiences that had a great impact on her psyche, but she is unable to reveal them due to fear of the consequences. Or does it not seem Weak in front of her family, and these dreams portend the beginning of your entry into the stage of depression. It is necessary to talk to someone close to you and ignore any fear in your mind and heart. If she sees a volcano, this means success in work, in addition to her great love for money and power. As for seeing a volcano erupting in a dream and seeing lava, this indicates the positive energy that she is going through, and perhaps she will meet a man she loves or get a job or get new educational courses. Interpretation of a dream about a volcano for a married woman Volcanic eruptions mean that she is an active woman who does many successful businesses. Then it indicates achieving goals with great success and progress. Then a dormant volcano means that her emotions are dry and her abilities are declining. Interpretation of dreams of volcanic steam coming out of the sky means that she is making a great effort, but to no avail. Seeing a dream about a volcano for a pregnant woman Interpretation of seeing an active volcano in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her fetus is healthy. Also, an active volcano, if the pregnancy is for the first time, means the possibility of giving birth to a normal child. Mentioning the volcano in a pregnant woman’s dream. Interpretation of dreams of escaping from a volcano Interpretation of seeing escaping from a volcano in a dream is a sign that you feel fear. If you are a student, you are afraid of exams and if you Soldier, you are afraid of death and as much as you watch the volcano erupt while trying to escape from it then it means that you are dealing with a person who is ill-mannered and very angry and if in reality you manage to escape without getting hurt then it means that you can improve your situation with this person without him hurting you or reprimanding you for what you did.

title: Secrets of interpretation of seeing a person getting married in a dream, for good and evil

preview.html: Through this article, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a man getting married in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. In detail, seeing a wedding in a dream is one of the common visions that dreamers see. The dreamer may see that he is at his own wedding or sees another person marrying acquaintances, relatives or friends, and although this occasion symbolizes happiness on earth, her arrival in the world of dreams arouses her curiosity to know the meanings. This dream bodes well for dreamers, especially the unmarried dreamer, but for married people it is a strange vision. What is this? Interpretations of a dream about marriage in a dream. We will answer this question in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a man getting married in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he sees a familiar person getting married, then this is one of the promising visions that indicate a change in his circumstances for the better. But if the person The one who marries in the dreamer’s dream is the father, then this is evidence of his integrity, and it is also a promising dream for him to have an abundant source of livelihood by earning a lot of money. If in a dream you see a well-known person marrying a dead woman, this is good news for him to achieve what he wants In fact, if the dreamer sees a famous person marrying a girl who is considered one of his mahrams, then this dream is one of the dreams promising a visit to the Sacred House of God, if the vision comes in the holy months and in general, it indicates a kinship relationship. Seeing a wedding with a sister in a dream is one of the visions that express The appearance of family problems for the dreamer. As for the married man who sees that his wife has married someone else, this dream is not considered bad, but rather good, as it indicates the dreamer’s goodness and abundance of livelihood. When the dreamer sees that he is marrying a witch, this indicates that the dreamer is working in A profession that is against the law. If you see a person marrying another man, this dream indicates overcoming those who have malice and malice in reality. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the marriage of a deceased person in a dream as one of the visions that express his good condition and integrity. When the dreamer sees that he is marrying a beautiful girl, this means It reflects his bad psychological state in reality. Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream according to Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi indicated that seeing a man marrying a divorced woman in a dream is a promising vision of happiness and abundance of livelihood. But if the dreamer sees that this person is marrying a non-Muslim woman, then this dream does not bode well, Because it expresses many forbidden actions that this person commits in reality. When the dreamer dreams that a man he knows is marrying a dead girl, this dream is one of the dreams that portends good things and changes circumstances for the better. When the dreamer sees that he is going to get married in a dream, this indicates that he He enters a new phase in his life. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a young man: If an unmarried young man dreams that he is marrying a dead girl, then this dream indicates a kinship relationship. But when the dreamer sees that he is attending another person’s wedding and sees a wedding cake, then this vision is one of the worthy visions With praise that heralds a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better. When a woman marries a Messiah

title: Interpretation of a cook in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Seeing a cook in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cook in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for the word cook. Interpretation of cooking in a dream for an unmarried, divorced, and unmarried pregnant girl. Interpretation of a cook in a dream. A cook in a dream indicates that seeing him is a sign of joys and pleasures. A market cook, his vision shows that he is facing benefit. The wandering cook, seeing him, suggests proximity and movement from one place to another, or From one country to another, the cook and everyone who deals with fire has gossip, quarrels, and hatred. The cook is a good guide for someone who wants to get married. The sick person does not praise cooking because it is ready to spoil. The cook incites people to the causes of life. Interpretation of the cook in a dream according to Nabulsi. A dream about a cook in the house indicates the happiness of the rich and the poor and their marriage except the sick person, because it indicates danger. His illness. Interpretation of the cook in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever dreams: that he cooks something with a good smell and taste, then it is pure and pleasant, then this indicates goodness and earning blessings in proportion to this, and if he sees otherwise, then it is the opposite of it. It was said that the dream of a cook is interpreted as talking to someone who asks about food and speaks because of the food. YouTube’s interpretation of cooking lamb. title: Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house When scorpions appear in your home, fear invades your heart and you think about the harm that could happen near you and could cause you to your family and your family members, and it bothers you a lot if you see many shapes and types of scorpions and try it. Someone stings inside the house, so the dream of scorpions inside your house carries a lot of psychological harm for you, so does it also mean harm or not? We discuss its most important interpretations in our topic. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house: It is not good to see scorpions in general in your dream, especially if they are near you or moving inside your home. This means that there are many dangers in your environment, and bad events and heated disputes may occur between you and individuals. Your family – Be very protective of your family if you see scorpions in your home, especially if they try to bite one of them. Sometimes the sleeper finds scorpions in his home, and this can be explained by the punishment that the days bring him due to the apparent lack of worship and lack of interest in prayer, which means that he does not repent for the mistakes that he made. He commits it, but he insists on his insistence. . In all of this, his friendship and acquaintance with him continues, but he carries a lot of hatred and corruption in his characteristics, and it will hurt him a lot if he deals with him. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the appearance of scorpions in the house is a sign of some disturbing things that will happen around the person in the near future and may also affect On his family and will harm his family, and if the fortuneteller himself does bad things, it will harm. It is an illusion that must be avoided, and if you find that a scorpion is stinging you inside your home, many crises or conflicts will happen to you, God forbid. One of the indications of the presence of scorpions in the house in a dream is that it is a bad sign, especially if a woman sees this scorpion in her bed or bedroom. , as it means that she will fall into malice and betrayal with her husband. . Her betrayal is annoying and not praiseworthy at all. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house for single women. Lawyers confirm that scorpions in the house for single women are a warning sign that they will be exposed to problems due to the hatred of some people close to them, and they may be among her friends or family, so she has a lot of beautiful things, so also People hate her and wish her good intentions, and if she finds a scorpion in the bedroom, this indicates intense envy that surrounds her life and can spoil it and affect her. With the presence of scorpions in the girl’s home, it can be said that there are unpleasant circumstances affecting her in her home, and they can be material and therefore circumstances. The work is unstable and involves many problems and conflicts. time. As a student, a girl’s school life is affected by many bad circumstances and she may suffer from disappointment and despair for some time in the future. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house for a married woman: With the presence of scorpions in the house for a married woman, the meaning confirms the many harms that happen to her, and the serious psychological effects that they inflict on her. Or on her husband, as well as some family members. There will be judgments from family or friends affecting them,

title: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi's interpretation, potatoes are considered a starchy vegetable that is used in preparing many delicious meals and contains many important nutrients for the health of the body in general. There are many people interested in interpreting potatoes in a dream and that this dream can indicate interpretations that affect real life. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes in a dream, Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretations of potatoes in a dream differed depending on the following cases: Whoever sees in a dream that he is planting potatoes, this is evidence of his insistence and efforts to achieve his dreams on earth. Seeing potatoes in a rotten state indicates that the dreamer is suffering from problems in his life. Eating boiled potatoes in a dream indicates goodness and abundance of food represented by money. Seeing buying potatoes in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into a financial crisis. Seeing potatoes in a dream symbolizes haste and quick insight in making decisions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes in a dream, Al-Nabulsi's interpretation. Al-Nabulsi mentioned that peeling potatoes in a dream indicates the end of the problems of insight. Seeing cooked potatoes in a dream indicates the problems that the dreamer faces In reality. Whoever sees in a dream that he is washing potatoes in a dream, this indicates the beginning of a new stage in his life. Seeing boiled potatoes in a dream means recovery from illness, if the dreamer suffers from an illness in reality. Seeing potatoes in a dream indicates good luck and good offspring. Eating sweet potatoes in a dream indicates joy and happiness in reality. Seeing fried potatoes in a dream symbolizes the problems that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretation of a dream of seeing potatoes in a dream for a single woman Seeing potatoes in a dream for an unmarried woman has a number of connotations. It may indicate her failure to achieve the goals that she was trying to achieve in reality, and she may face psychological problems in her life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is eating potatoes, this indicates that she is in a psychological crisis. Washing potatoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. Interpretation of a dream of seeing potatoes in a dream for a married woman The dream of buying potatoes in a dream for a married woman indicates the financial problems that she will face in her life in reality. Cooking potatoes in a dream for a married woman portends the death of worries and the approach of her vagina. Seeing potatoes in a dream for a married woman indicates pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Seeing potatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing potatoes in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good sign and it is approaching the womb. Seeing potatoes and planting them in a dream is evidence of an easy birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams is an important field that has emerged in the recent period, and scientists are interested in clarifying this science and clarifying its details as much as possible and finding logical interpretations for most dreams, even for

title: Interpretation of a dream about magic among relatives by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives: It is considered one of the dreams that indicate the presence of magic in many forms, and magic indicates hypocrisy, lying, and cheating, while buried magic can mean treasure or money, but it is not preserved, and we learn more interpretations through this article. Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives: What is it? Interpretation of a dream about magic for Ibn Sirin’s relatives? If one of the relatives sees magic, this indicates the appearance or presence of an evil and many family problems and disagreements that may lead to separation, worry, worry, and multiple confrontations between family members. This dream indicates a large number of temptations, transgressions, and sins committed by the dreamer. In fact, it is also evidence of a lack of religion and following paths that indicate evil, sins and bad morals. The interpretation of dreams about magic by relatives means a lot of temptations, following desires, gossip and gossip that characterize the dreamer in reality. What is the interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives to single people? If an unmarried girl sees witchcraft on the part of relatives in her dream, this indicates the presence of a deceitful and dishonest person or a person characterized by lies, deception, and cunning in her life. Seeing witchcraft on an unmarried woman in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the presence of a sign from God Almighty (Glory be to Him). Almighty) to clarify the extent of her negligence in faith and a sign of turning away from the forbidden actions that she performs, and indicates the girl’s flaws in her mind. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about magic by relatives for a married womanIf a married woman sees magic in a dream From relatives, this indicates that it is a sign from God warning this woman against a state of deception, hypocrisy, lying, and the presence of many deceivers around her. It also indicates many problems, difficulties and disagreements that will end. In the case of a dream of seeing magic from one of the relatives, this indicates that the person He tries to cause a lot of disturbances and problems in the life of a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft by relatives for a divorced woman. If you see witchcraft from relatives in a divorced woman’s dream, this means a big change and a big explosion that will lead to many positive changes and change her life for the better in terms of financial situation and obtaining many things. . money. The interpretation of dreams about witchcraft by relatives is one of the dreams that indicate absolute goodness, as it indicates that she will live a life characterized by luxury and spend the most beautiful periods and days of her life. The witchcraft of relatives in the dream of a divorced woman is evidence of getting rid of the troubles and difficulties that she is going through. Deciphering witchcraft in a dream The dream of witchcraft by relatives for a pregnant woman is evidence of a lot of anxiety, stress, and confusion related to pregnancy and childbirth and indicates the presence of many deceivers around her, and they are often relatives, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of agriculture in a dream - seeing agriculture in a dream

preview.html: The dream of planting, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man watering the green plant, walking through the planting, the farm, the harvest, and the orchard, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of planting in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing plants in a dream portends great goodness, such as if a person dreams that he is plowing the land and planting it, this indicates that this A person will get married if he is single or married, this indicates that he will make a lot of profits in the field of currency. Dream interpretation scholars say that if one sees in a dream that he is cultivating the land, this means that his situation will change and that God will grant him a lot of money and goodness. But if one sees In his dream that he is protecting the planting, this means that he will face a wide range of problems and that they will be solved soon. But if he sees in a dream that he is reaping the land in the mosque, this indicates reaping a wage and reward, especially if there is no stranger among them in that place or in the mosque. If you see that you are planting or cultivating land, know that you are replacing bad with good and trying to make those around you happy. If you are not married, know that you will accept marriage and a happy new life. Good luck, may God grant you success. If you are married, know that you will have a good new child or child. If you find yourself defending your planting from any pest or fire, know that you will face problems that require a great effort to maintain your happiness, your work, and your happiness. Interpretation of agriculture in a dream by Ibn Sirin, where one sees in his dream that the land is being cultivated And it is harvested, this indicates that there will be a war in the same place and the result will be the killing and destruction of people as much as this crop. And whoever sees in his dream that he is planting seeds in the ground, this indicates the birth of a new baby. Likewise, seeing the land on which it is possible to plant, indicates that the woman She is the one who gave birth. And whoever dreams that he is plowing his land in his dream, this indicates that he will marry if he does not marry, and if he is a merchant, his business will be profitable. And whoever sees ears in the ground, this means money or children, and whoever sees ears in a dream, this indicates dhikr circles and mosques. And seeing harvesting ears means someone who was killed in war. As for whoever sees yellow ears in his dream, this indicates the death of the elderly and the elderly. If their color is green, this indicates the death of youth, and whoever sees in his dream that he is harvesting at the wrong time, this indicates Death, war, and a dream about ears indicates the collection of money in this world, because God Almighty mentioned the ears as an example of salary and the multiplication of money, and there is an increase in charity. Likewise, whoever sees a grain of wheat in his bed in a dream, or a married woman sees wheat in her bed, this means that she is pregnant. Interpretation of Harvest Crops in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is collecting crops and selling them in the market, this means that he will earn a lot of money. In his dream, he was growing barley and did not realize that this person was poor. Interpretation of the farm in a dream: If one sees that he is doing work on a green farm, this indicates However, this person seeks good deeds in his life, and this indicates the long life of that person. But if one sees in a dream that yellow ears are dying,
